name: Achtung die Kugel!
description: A local multiplayer game with skill and tactics! Score by being the last player to crash in each round. Achtung die Kugel is a re-imagination of the classic game "Achtung die Kurve".
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Memory: 200 MB RAM Storage: 420 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
